messages.content: I need to raise funding and want to know what i should have ready

FUNDING READINESS CHECKLIST

PRIMARY FLOWS AFFECTED:
• CASH FLOW - Capital acquisition
• INFO FLOW - Investor communication
• VALUE FLOW - Market validation

ESSENTIAL MATERIALS:

Financial Package:
• 3-year financial projections
• Current P&L and cash flow statements
• Unit economics and key metrics
• Funding use breakdown

Business Case:
• Clear problem/solution fit
• Market size and opportunity
• Competitive advantage
• Revenue model validation
• Customer traction proof

Team & Operations:
• Founder/team backgrounds
• Organizational structure
• Key partnerships
• Intellectual property status

IMMEDIATE NEXT STEPS:
1. Create investor deck (10-12 slides max)
2. Prepare 2-minute elevator pitch
3. Build target investor list
4. Get legal docs reviewed

KEY TIP: Lead with traction metrics and clear path to profitability. Investors fund momentum, not just ideas.

Need help with any specific component?
Can you visualize your mental model in ascii

BROVERSE BIZ MENTAL MODEL™ (BBMM)

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────┐
│            FOUR FLOWS CORE              │
├─────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                                         │
│  VALUE ──→ INFO ──→ WORK ──→ CASH      │
│    ↑         ↑        ↑        ↓       │
│    └─────────┴────────┴────────┘       │
│         (Feedback Loop)                 │
│                                         │
├─────────────────────────────────────────┤
│         12 CORE CAPABILITIES            │
├─────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                                         │
│ Strategy    Operations   Finance        │
│ Marketing   Sales        Technology     │
│ Product     People       Legal          │
│ Partners    Data         Innovation     │
│                                         │
├─────────────────────────────────────────┤
│          64 BUSINESS PATTERNS           │
├─────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                                         │
│ [Revenue Models] [Growth Hacks]         │
│ [Market Entry]   [Scale Patterns]       │
│ [Risk Mitigation][Optimization]         │
│ [Partnership]    [Exit Strategies]      │
│                                         │
└─────────────────────────────────────────┘

ANALYSIS FRAMEWORK:
1. Identify broken/weak flows
2. Map to affected capabilities  
3. Apply relevant patterns
4. Optimize flow connections
```

Every business challenge maps to this model for systematic problem-solving.
can you improve this so it looks good in telegram since we are talking here

BROVERSE BIZ MENTAL MODEL™

Finance • Technology • Legal • Innovation

⚡ 64 BUSINESS PATTERNS

Market Entry • Scale Patterns

Partnership • Exit Strategies

📊 HOW IT WORKS:
1️⃣ Spot the broken flow
2️⃣ Find affected capabilities
3️⃣ Apply business patterns
4️⃣ Optimize connections

FLOW HEALTH CHECK:
✅ VALUE: Are customers happy?
✅ INFO: Do you have clear data?
✅ WORK: Are processes smooth?
✅ CASH: Is money flowing in?

Every business problem fits this framework. Just tell me your challenge and I'll map it through the flows!
